title: Private Group Hillside Escape in the Stunning South Pacific
description: Experience 180-degree panoramic ocean views from the wrap-around verandahs of The White House-a private hillside home in Norfolk Island. Indulge in ultimate seclusion in a 10-person oasis overlooking the lush trees and azure waters of the South Pacific. Includes light continental breakfast, four 60-minute massages, use of a Sedan or eight-seater minivan, private return airport transfers, access to Cumberland Resort & Spa and more.
offer_address: 65 Martins Road Norfolk Island NSW NF, 2899, Norfolk Island
